_header: Saint Gregory sayeth it was a clerk
_description: Dying Monk sees Dragon: a Narratio in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodSelSup52.First Lines:
sant gregor says yt was a clerkeþat lest þe fend &
                    all hys werke…
BodSelSup52.Last Lines:
…& graunt vs at our last endyngþe blys of heuyn
                    þer he ys kyng

CULDd11.First Lines:
SEynt Gregori seyth it was a clerkþat lefte þe ferd &
                    al his werk…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…& graunt vs at oure last endingþe blis of heuene
                    þer he is king

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
Seynt Gregore sais it was a clerkÞat lefte þe fonde &
                    al his werk…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…And graunte vs at oure last endyngÞe blisse of heuene
                    þere he es kyng
